title: Beyoncé’s Best Grammy 2017 Moments
text:
Bow down. Tonight at the Grammys, Beyoncé took to the stage to prove that everything she touches is gold– literally. Clad in gold head-to-toe (ok, not as much gold as Cee-Lo ) and showing off her shimmering baby bump, Beyoncé performed “Love Drought” and “Sandcastles.” Here’s a handy GIF bible to carry around with you this week, because when there are no words, there are Beyonce GIFs.
If only all waves at sporting events looked like this:
Bow down to the queen:

The greatest look anyone has ever looked:

What can only be described as pure magic: 

That feeling when you’re pregnant, but also Beyoncé.

When you don’t know what your ghost children are up to:

They definitely didn’t bow enough the first time, so she’ll do it again:
Is Beyoncé’s womb also lined with gold?
There’s no way to know how this was done:

Yellow scarves are about to be so in:

If you look closely, you can see the Daft Punk robots:

Great use of gold here, much more majestic than Cee-Lo:

Behold, Beyoncé’s future presidential campaign GIF:

Tags: beyonce queen b grammy's grammy's 2017 A GIF Bible of Beyoncé’s Most Glorious Grammy Moments Share on Facebook Tweet this Story Top Stories Here Are Your 2017 Grammy Winners Frank Ocean Fires Back at the ‘Faulty’ Grammys for Their ‘Cultural Bias’ Leslie Jones Really Wants to Play Donald Trump Most Viewed Stories Jake Tapper Has a One-Word Response to SNL’s Unhinged Fatal Attraction Sketch Everyone Performing at the 2017 Grammys Rosie O’Donnell Won’t Be Playing Steve Bannon on SNL The Meanest Lines From the Fifty Shades Darker Reviews What’s New on Netflix: February 2017 What to Stream Now See what's new and notable on Netflix, Amazon, Hulu, and HBO Kellyanne Conway Isn’t Going to Be Ignored in Her Very Own Fatal Attraction Parody Piers Morgan Told to ‘F*ck Off’ for Dismissing Trump Fears As ‘Hysteria’ on Real Time With Bill Maher Melissa McCarthy’s Sean Spicer Returns to SNL in the Hope of Becoming Calm Saturday Night Live Recap: Alec Baldwin and Melissa McCarthy Keep It Spicey Here Are Your 2017 Grammy Winners Most Popular Video On Vulture The Best Bloopers From Friends Latest News from Vulture 5 mins ago ’80s Queen Carly Rae Jepsen Did a Mighty Colorful ‘It Takes Two’ Remake It probably took more than one take.

9 mins ago A GIF Bible of Beyoncé’s Most Glorious Grammy Moments You’ll never need another GIF.
24 mins ago WATCH: For the First Time, the Grammys Recognized David Bowie for His Music It was the first time he was recognized by the Grammys for his music.
10:45 p.m. Girls Season Premiere Recap: She’s So High Is Hannah Horvath finally growing up?
10:41 p.m. Beyoncé Gives Moving Grammy Acceptance Speech “It’s important to me to show images to my children that reflect their beauty.”
10:30 p.m. Why Girls Is So Good When It Leaves New York City Outside, everything is clearer, simpler, more candid.
10:28 p.m. Katy Perry Pays Homage to Hillary Clinton, Elizabeth Warren at 2017 Grammys She wore an armband that said, simply, “Persist.”
10:13 p.m. The Walking Dead Recap: Turn That Frown Upside Down “Rock in the Road” has one of the show’s greatest zombie slaughter scenes.
10:05 p.m. 2017 NAACP Image Awards: Beyoncé, Moonlight , and Black-ish Win Big Read the full 2017 NAACP Image Award winner list.
10:03 p.m. Watch Beyoncé Perform of ‘Love Drought’ and ‘Sandcastles’ at the Grammys She performed “Love Drought” and “Sandcastles.”
10:00 p.m. Victoria Recap: A Man of Principle Teamwork makes the dream work, Victoria!
10:00 p.m. The Young Pope Recap: The World Is Always Ready for Love Cardinal Gutierrez isn’t doing so hot in New York.
10:00 p.m. Homeland Recap: Whistleblowers It’ll be very interesting to see where Homeland goes from here.
9:42 p.m. Here Are Your 2017 Grammy Winners Who’s collecting golden gramophones?
9:23 p.m. When SNL Makes Fart Jokes and the Audience Expects Donald Trump Resistance SNL had a classic meh episode when the expectations were higher than ever.
9:09 p.m. Girls Changed Hannah’s Look After Judd Apatow Noted She Looked ‘Too Attractive’ “Her outfit is too cute, her hair and makeup looks too good. We are making an underdog here!”
9:00 p.m. The Real Housewives of Atlanta Recap: Glamping Gone Wild Way harsh, Marlo.
9:00 p.m. The Girls Writers Room on Putting Words in the Mouths of Hannah and Her Friends “Lena’s the kind of person who doesn’t realize it would hurt someone’s feelings to say, ‘I’d like to mock your songs on the show.’”
9:00 p.m. A Complete Timeline of All Controversies Girls Started So many think pieces.
